tit.e: Toshi Kaden (biographies of the Fujiwara clan)

sen.j: 藤氏家伝（藤氏家傳・ とうしかでん）は天平宝字四年（760年）に成立した。
sen.e: The Toshi Kaden was written in 760.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The Toshi Kaden was written in 760.
The "Toshi Kaden" was written in 760.
sen.cmt: Toshi Kaden にダブルクォーテーションを追記しました。

sen.j: 古代から藤原氏に代々伝えられてきた、藤原氏初期の歴史が記された伝記であり、上・下とある。
sen.e: It is family biographies of the early Fujiwara clan of two-volume book that passed down from generation to generation since early times.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Within a two-volume series, the Toshi Kaden contains family histories of the early Fujiwara Clan which were passed down through many generations.
Within a two-volume series, the Toshi Kaden contains family histories of the early Fujiwara Clan which were passed down through many generations.

sen.j: 省略して家伝ともいう。
sen.e: It is also called the "Kaden" for short.
It is also called the "Kaden" for short.
It is also called the "Kaden" for short.

sen.j: 日本書紀や続日本紀には無い歴史が記述されている。
sen.e: Some case histories described here were not shown in the Nihonshoki (Chronicles of Japan) and the Zoku Nihongi (Continuation of Chronicles of Japan).
Some case histories described here do not appear in the Nihonshoki (Chronicles of Japan) and the Zoku Nihongi (Continuation of Chronicles of Japan).
Some case histories described here do not appear in the Nihonshoki (Chronicles of Japan) and the Shoku Nihongi (Chronicle of Japan Continued).
sen.cmt: 用語集の表記に従い、Zoku Nihongi (Continuation of Chronicles of Japan) をShoku Nihongi (Chronicle of Japan Continued) に修正しました。

sen.j: 家伝上（「大織冠伝」）の著・編者は恵美押勝であり、藤原鎌足と定恵と藤原史(藤原不比等)の伝記を記したものである。
sen.e: The first volume of the Kaden (known formally as Taishokukan-den) was written and edited by Oshikatsu EMI and it described the biographies of Kamatari NAKATOMI, Joe and FUJIWARA no fuhito.

The first volume of the Kaden (known formally as Taishokukan-den) was written and edited by Oshikatsu EMI and it describes the biographies of Kamatari FUJIWARA, Joe, and Fuhito FUJIWARA (FUJIWARA no Fuhito).
sen.cmt: rewording;although NAKATOMI is another name of Kamatari Fujiwara, it does not appear in the original Japanese text, so I have returned it back to FUJIWARA
sen.e: The first volume of the Kaden (known formally as 'Taishokukan-den') was written and edited by Oshikatsu EMI and it describes the biographies of Kamatari FUJIWARA, Joe, and Fuhito FUJIWARA (FUJIWARA no Fuhito).
sen.cmt: Taishokukan-den にシングルクォーテーションを追記しました。

sen.j: ただし、藤原不比等の条は現存しない。
sen.e: However, the passage of Fuhito FUJIWARA was lost.
However, the passages of FUJIWARA no Fuhito were lost.
However, the passages of FUJIWARA no Fuhito were lost.

sen.j: 家伝下（「武智麻呂伝」）の著・編者は僧延慶 (僧)であり、藤原武智麻呂の伝記を記したものである。
sen.e: The second volume of the Kaden (known formally Muchimaro-den) was written and edited by Enkei, the Buddhist monk, and it described the biography of Muchimaro FUJIWARA.
The second volume of the Kaden (known formally Muchimaro-den) was written and edited by Enkei, the Buddhist monk, and it describes the biography of FUJIWARA no Muchimaro.
The second volume of the Kaden (known formally 'Muchimaro-den') was written and edited by Enkei, the Buddhist priest, and it describes the biography of FUJIWARA no Muchimaro.
sen.cmt: Muchimaro-den にシングルクォーテーションを追記しました。monk を priest に修正しました。
